title: Chapter 751 - The Saber Of Divine Hatred
volume_title: A Sword Suppresses Thirty Thousand Years
body:
Chapter 751 - The Saber Of Divine Hatred

The late-stage Spiritual Revolution Realm… it seems that his cultivation has improved since the onset of the Radiant Epoch… thought Su Yi.

When Ye Yunlan first brought up Ye Xiao, he said that Ye Xiao was in the mid-stage Spiritual Revolution Realm, but that few other Spiritual Revolution Realm cultivators in the Mysterious Blue Realm were a match for him.

He also said that Ye Xiao’s Grand Dao Spirit Wheel was transcendently high quality. It was called the Purgatory of Slaughter.

And now, Ye Xiao was in the late-stage Spiritual Revolution Realm!

“Su Yi, there’s still time to obediently hand over the Seed of the Azure,” Ye Jinzhi couldn’t help but interject, a trace of pity in her expression. “If you don’t, you’re doomed.”

Su Yi laughed, then swept his gaze across the Ye Family experts before looking up at the sea of clouds, where Ye Xiao was waiting for him. “Wipe your eyes and watch carefully.”

As he spoke, the woman in the feather coat brought Ye Yunlan over.

“What are you doing here? Foolish!” When Ye Yunlan saw Su Yi on Moonview Plateau, his expression changed dramatically.

“You’re the foolish one,” sighed Su Yi.

Ye Yunlan wasn’t hurt, but he was obviously in extremely low spirits. His hair was disheveled,...
original_title: Chapter 751 - The Saber of Divine Hatred
